import React, { useState } from 'react'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import FetchApi from '../../Api/FetchApi'; const WorldWide = () => { const [DisplayData, setDisplayData] = useState() const FetchedApi = async () => { const data = await FetchApi(); setDisplayData(data); } FetchedApi() console.log(DisplayData); return (<>

) } export default WorldWide;
